Scenario: Login to the Facebook Page using default credentials # featuresfiles/FacebookLogin.feature:11 When I successfully login to Facebook with default credentials # FacebookStepDefinitions.i_successfully_login_to_Facebook_with_default_credentials() Then the Facebook Welcome Page is successfully displayed # FacebookStepDefinitions.validateFacebookWelcomePage()
